title: [BinFmt] Support extended messages in binary log and binary viewer
body:
#8917 will introduce new internal EventArgs `Extended*EventArgs`
In context of PR such events are stored in binary log as existing corresponding non extended `*EventArgs`.

As there is certain value in showing exteneded event data in binary log we need to:
- [x] create new binary log events
- [x] de/ser those
- [x] bump up [`FileFormat`](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/src/Build/Logging/BinaryLogger/BinaryLogger.cs#L63)
- [x] facilitate updating binary log viewer to support those
